email_group_1.subject: Annual Performance Review Feedback
email_group_1.desc:
Dear Employee, 

We hope this message finds you well. As part of our annual performance review process, we have compiled feedback regarding your performance over the past year. Attached to this email, you will find a detailed report outlining the strengths and areas for improvement identified during your review. 

Please take the time to read through the feedback and prepare for a follow-up meeting with your manager next week. It’s important to discuss this feedback in detail and understand how you can continue to grow within the company. 

If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out. Thank you for your hard work and dedication to our team. 

Best regards, 
HR Team
email_group_1.explain: The email is from HR, contains a relevant attachment, and is consistent with company procedures.

email_group_1.subject: Urgent: Update Your Payment Information
email_group_1.desc:
Dear Employee, 

We have noticed that your payment information is outdated. To ensure that there are no disruptions in your salary payments, please click on the link below to update your information immediately. Failure to do so may result in delayed payments. 

[Update Payment Info Here] 

Attached is an invoice that outlines your current payment details. Please review it carefully. 

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter. 

Best, 
Finance Team
email_group_1.explain: The email requests sensitive information and contains an executable attachment, which is a common phishing tactic.

email_group_2.subject: Quarterly Budget Review Meeting
email_group_2.desc:
Hello Team, 

As we approach the end of the quarter, we would like to schedule a meeting to review the budget and discuss any necessary adjustments. The meeting is set for next Thursday at 2 PM in the main conference room. 

Attached is the current budget report for your review prior to the meeting. Please come prepared with any questions or suggestions you may have. Your input is valuable to ensure we stay on track with our financial goals. 

Looking forward to seeing everyone there. 

Best, 
Finance Department
email_group_2.explain: The email is professional, contains a relevant attachment, and discusses a legitimate company meeting.

email_group_2.subject: Immediate Action Required: Security Update
email_group_2.desc:
Dear Employee, 

We have detected unusual activity in our network and require all employees to update their security settings immediately. Please download the attached file and run it to ensure your device is secure. 

Failure to comply may result in compromised data. 

Thank you for your cooperation. 

Regards, 
Security Team
email_group_2.explain: The email creates a sense of urgency and contains a suspicious executable attachment, typical of phishing attempts.

email_group_3.subject: New Training Program Enrollment
email_group_3.desc:
Dear Team, 

We are excited to announce a new training program aimed at enhancing your skills and career growth. Attached is the training schedule along with details on how to enroll. We encourage everyone to take advantage of this opportunity to learn and develop. 

Please review the schedule and let us know if you have any questions. Enrollment will be open until the end of the month. 

Best regards, 
HR Team
email_group_3.explain: The email promotes a legitimate training program and includes an appropriate attachment.

email_group_3.subject: Important: Account Verification Needed
email_group_3.desc:
Dear Employee, 

We need to verify your account information to ensure your access to our services. Please download the attached form and submit it as soon as possible. 

Failure to verify your account may result in a temporary suspension of your access. 

Thank you, 
Support Team
email_group_3.explain: The email requests sensitive account information and has an executable attachment, indicating a phishing attempt.

email_group_4.subject: Facilities Maintenance Schedule
email_group_4.desc:
Hello Everyone, 

We would like to inform you about the upcoming maintenance schedule for the office facilities. Attached is a PDF detailing the dates and times when maintenance will occur. Please plan accordingly to minimize disruptions. 

If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out. 

Thank you for your understanding, 
Facilities Management
email_group_4.explain: The email provides relevant information about office maintenance, which is standard communication from facilities.

email_group_4.desc:

We have updated our email system and need you to confirm your email address to avoid any service interruptions. Please download the attached file and follow the instructions to verify your email.

We are in the process of planning our annual team outing and would like to gather your input. Attached is a document outlining potential activities and dates. Please review it and come prepared to discuss your preferences at our meeting next week.
